definitions.definition: To place; to set in a particular spot or position.
To find out where something is located.
examples: I really can't locate the sever files.

definitions.definition: To designate the site or place of; to define the limits of ( Note : the designation may be purely descriptive : it need not be prescriptive .)
examples: The council must locate the new hospital
to locate (the land granted by) a land warrant

definitions.definition: To place oneself; to take up one's residence; to settle.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To place; to set in a particular spot or position.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To find out where something is located.
( transitive ) To designate the site or place of; to define the limits of ( Note : the designation may be purely descriptive : it need not be prescriptive .)
( intransitive , colloquial ) To place oneself; to take up one's residence; to settle.
